about_the_game:
Survive as a pacifist alien in a chaotic bullet hell!

Crash-landing on Earth was not part of the plan, and neither was the hostile welcome from its paranoid inhabitants. As a peaceful UFO pilot, you find yourself under attack from relentless mobs, police forces, the army, helicopters, and even a special boss level. But you're not defenseless—your advanced tech bracelet equips you with:

  • Shield Redirect: Deflect projectiles back at your enemies with an awesome shield.

  • Transparency Ability: Become intangible, allowing bullets to pass through you harmlessly.

  • Agile Maneuvers: Sprint and roll to dodge nonstop attacks.

Your mission is critical: find the 10 scattered screws needed to repair your spaceship and escape before it's too late. Every second counts in this adrenaline-pumping, rogue-like, skill-based game where quick reflexes are your best ally.

Can you survive the mayhem and return home? Survive, little alien... survive!


Features:

  • Tutorial level

  • Escape mode - 2 levels & Boss Level.

  • Survival mode.

  • Difficult.

  • Destructible environments.

  • Bullet Hell.


A note from the developers

When considering buying I Come In Peace, please bear in mind that it is a small game created by a fresh new developer team. Inspired by epic arcade machine games, the gameplay is highly skill-based with fast-paced decision-making. If you're all about high stimulation with zero patience, this breathless bullet hell is what you need.

Please don’t hesitate to get in touch if you have feedback, questions, or problems with the game. We'll do our best to get back to you quickly. Also, let us know if you enjoyed I Come In Peace, we respond well to positive reinforcement.

legal_notice:
Age Rating and Content Warnings:
This game features animated violence. Human characters, including civilians, police, and military personnel, may die as a result of friendly fire while defending themselves against an alien protagonist. Ragdoll physics are used to represent human casualties temporarily before bodies disappear. Player discretion is advised for those sensitive to depictions of violence.

Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or use of these assets is strictly prohibited without the express written permission of the developer.

End-User License Agreement (EULA):
By downloading, installing, or playing I Come In Peace, you agree to the terms outlined in our [End-User License Agreement](link to Steam EULA). This includes but is not limited to limitations on reverse engineering, sharing, and modifying game content without prior consent.

Disclaimers:
While every effort has been made to ensure a bug-free experience, I Come In Peace is under constant quality assurance testing and improvements. Users may encounter occasional bugs, but the development team is committed to releasing updated versions to address any issues as they are discovered.

short_description: Don't panic! survive this bullet hell action! As a goofy pacifist alien that crashed on Earth, use your defense abilities to evade paranoid humans whose deadly attacks on you cause destruction and mayhem. Navigate the chaos, collect your spaceship parts, and run the hell out of this planet!
